QueryResult.text: SELECT AD.ID ALLOCATION_DETAIL_ID, FP.ID PERIOD_ID, S.SLICE PERCENTAGE, FP.START_DATE, FP.END_DATE-1 END_DATE FROM CBK_GL_ALLOCATION_DETAIL AD INNER JOIN ODF_SSL_GL_ALL_DTL_PCT S ON AD.ID = S.PRJ_OBJECT_ID INNER JOIN PRJ_BLB_SLICEREQUESTS SR ON S.SLICE_REQUEST_ID = SR.ID INNER JOIN BIZ_COM_PERIODS FP ON FP.START_DATE BETWEEN S.START_DATE AND S.FINISH_DATE - 1 WHERE SR.REQUEST_NAME = 'glallocationdetail::percentage::segment' AND FP.PERIOD_TYPE = 'MONTHLY'
